      public int roomNumberMatchI​(String roomNumber)

      Returns:

    • rentMiniRoom

      public String rentMiniRoom​(int day, int month, int year, int servers, double cache, int processors, double ram, int disks, double disksCapacity, boolean brand, double surcharge, String roomNumber, boolean corporateUse)
      Creates a new rent
      Parameters:
      day - , int, day of the rent
      month - , int, month of the rent
      year - , int, year of the rent
      servers - , int, amount of servers for the rent
      cache - , double, this value can be a decimal number and its unit of measurement is GB (GygaByte)
      processors - , int, this is the number of processors that the server has
      ram - , double, this is the amount of ram memory which the server works with
      disks - , int, this is the amount of disks the server works with and it's an integer number
      disksCapacity - , double, this is the capacity of the disks. All disks work with the same capacity
      brand - , boolean, this boolean represents the brand of the server, true for INTEL, false for AMD
      surcharge - , double, this is the percentage of surcharge in the cost of the rent
      roomNumber - , String, this is the reference of the room that will be rented+
      corporateUse - , boolean, this boolean is true if the rent is for an investigation project, or it is for corporate usage
      Returns:
      rentalNumber, String, this is the number of the new rent

    • registerCompanyToRent

      Parameters:
      rentalNumber - , String, number of the rent
      name - , String, name of the company
      nit - , String, nit of the company

    • showMap

      public String showMap​(String instruction, int column, int hall)
      Creates a String with the information of the rooms
      Parameters:
      instruction - , String, this is a number that representates one instruction to show the map in a specific way
      column - , int, this the column of a room, it will be used for a turning off option
      hall - , int, this is the hall of a room, it will be used for a turning off option
      Returns:
      availableRooms, String, This is the information of all the rooms

    • turningOffOptions

      public String turningOffOptions​(int i, int j, String instruction, int column, int hall)
      Validates the conditions of a room to turn it off according the option
      Parameters:
      i - , int, this is the row
      j - , int, this is the column
      instruction - , String, this is the option
      column - , int, this the column of a room, it will be used for a turning off option
      hall - , String, this is the hall of a room, it will be used for a turning off option
      Returns:
      switchSymbol, String, this is the symbol of the room depending if the room must be turned on or off
